title: Composing Functions Left to Right
description: In this lab, we will explore the concept of function composition in JavaScript. Specifically, we will focus on the composeRight function, which allows us to combine multiple functions into a single function that is executed from left to right. Through practical examples, we will see how function composition can simplify our code and make it more modular.

meta.title: JavaScript Function Composition | Coding Tutorials
meta.description: Learn how to use function composition in JavaScript to simplify your code and make it more modular. Explore the composeRight function and practical examples.
meta.keywords: JavaScript, function composition, composeRight, coding tutorials, programming, web development

verify.name: Verify Node Usage In Zsh History
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 从左到右组合函数
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将探讨JavaScript中函数组合的概念。具体来说，我们将重点关注composeRight函数，它使我们能够将多个函数组合成一个从左到右执行的单一函数。通过实际示例，我们将看到函数组合如何简化我们的代码并使其更具模块化。

meta.title: JavaScript函数组合 | 编码教程
meta.description: 学习如何在JavaScript中使用函数组合来简化代码并使其更具模块化。探索composeRight函数和实际示例。
meta.keywords: JavaScript, 函数组合, composeRight, 编码教程, 编程, 网页开发

verify.name: 验证Zsh历史记录中Node的使用情况
verify.hint: 通过输入'node'并按Enter键，可以在终端/SSH中运行JavaScript。
